mapper.insert: insert into FILE_TBL(FILE_NM, FILE_PATH, FILE_CRT_DATE) values (#{file_nm}, #{file_path}, SYSDATE());
insert into STAR_TBL(STAR_NM, STAR_TYP, STAR_DBT_DATE, CMPY_NM, FILE_IDX) values (#{star_nm}, 1, SYSDATE(), #{cmpy_nm}, LAST_INSERT_ID());

insert into STAR_MEM_TBL(STAR_MEM_HGHT, STAR_MEM_BLD, STAR_MEM_WGHT, STAR_MEM_BIRTH, STAR_IDX, GRP_IDX) values (#{star_mem_hght}, #{star_mem_bld}, #{star_mem_wght}, #{star_mem_birth}, LAST_INSERT_ID(), #{grp_idx});
insert into FILE_TBL(FILE_NM, FILE_PATH, FILE_CRT_DATE) values (#{file_nm}, #{file_path}, SYSDATE());
insert into STAR_TBL(STAR_NM, STAR_TYP, STAR_DBT_DATE, CMPY_NM, FILE_IDX) values (#{star_nm}, 0, SYSDATE(), #{cmpy_nm}, LAST_INSERT_ID());
mapper.select: select S.STAR_IDX, S.STAR_NM, S.STAR_TYP, S.STAR_DBT_DATE, S.CMPY_NM, F.FILE_PATH, F.FILE_NM FROM STAR_TBL S inner join FILE_TBL F on S.FILE_IDX = F.FILE_IDX inner join STAR_TAG_TBL STT on STT.STAR_IDX = S.STAR_IDX where STT.TAG_NM like CONCAT('%', #{tag_nm}, '%') limit 10 offset #{offset};

select S.STAR_MEM_IDX, S.STAR_MEM_HGHT, S.STAR_MEM_BLD, S.STAR_MEM_WGHT, S.STAR_MEM_BIRTH, GS.STAR_NM, GS.STAR_TYP from STAR_MEM_TBL S right outer join GRP_TBL G on S.GRP_IDX = G.GRP_IDX right outer join STAR_TBL GS on G.STAR_IDX = GS.STAR_IDX where S.STAR_IDX = #{star_idx} and GS.STAR_TYP=0;
select G.GRP_IDX, G.CLB_SITE from GRP_TBL G inner join STAR_TBL S on G.STAR_IDX = S.STAR_IDX where G.STAR_IDX = #{star_idx};
mapper.update: update STAR_MEM_TBL SM inner join STAR_TBL SI on SM.STAR_IDX = SI.STAR_IDX inner join FILE_TBL FT on SM.FILE_IDX = FT.FILE_IDX set SM.STAR_MEM_HGHT = #{star_mem_hght}, SM.STAR_MEM_BLD = #{star_mem_bld}, SM.STAR_MEM_WGHT = #{star_mem_wght}, SM.STAR_MEM_BIRTH = #{star_mem_birth}, SI.STAR_DBT_DATE = #{star_dbt_date}, FT.FILE_NM = #{file_nm}, FT.FILE_PATH = #{file_path}, SM.GRP_IDX = (select * from (select G.GRP_IDX from GRP_TBL G inner join STAR_TBL S on G.STAR_IDX = S.STAR_IDX where S.STAR_NM = #{star_nm} and S.STAR_TYP = 0)T) where SM.STAR_MEM_IDX = #{star_mem_idx} and SI.STAR_TYP = 1;
mapper.delete: delete ST, SMT from STAR_TBL ST inner join STAR_MEM_TBL SMT on ST.STAR_IDX = SMT.STAR_IDX where SMT.STAR_MEM_IDX = #{star_mem_idx};

delete FT from STAR_TBL ST inner join STAR_MEM_TBL SMT on ST.STAR_IDX = SMT.STAR_IDX inner join FILE_TBL FT on FT.FILE_IDX = ST.FILE_IDX where SMT.STAR_MEM_IDX = #{star_mem_idx} and FT.FILE_NM != "base_profile"
delete ST, GT from STAR_TBL ST inner join GRP_TBL GT on ST.STAR_IDX = GT.GRP_IDX where ST.GRP_IDX = #{grp_idx};
delete FT from FILE_TBL FT inner join STAR_TBL ST on ST.FILE_IDX = FT.FILE_IDX inner join GRP_TBL GT on GT.STAR_IDX = ST.STAR_IDX where GT.GRP_IDX = #{grp_idx} and FT.FILE_NM != "base_profile"
mapper.select: select FT.FILE_NM, FT.FILE_PATH from STAR_TBL ST inner join STAR_MEM_TBL SMT on ST.STAR_IDX = SMT.STAR_IDX inner join FILE_TBL FT on ST.FILE_IDX = FT.FILE_IDX where SMT.STAR_MEM_IDX = #{value}
select FT.FILE_NM, FT.FILE_PATH from STAR_TBL ST inner join GRP_TBL GT on ST.STAR_IDX = GT.STAR_IDX inner join FILE_TBL FT on ST.FILE_IDX = FT.FILE_IDX where GT.GRP_IDX = #{value}
